backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing a feature request and associated evidence, targeting StartJourneyScreen.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text index summarizing frontend components and their roles in the RV experience flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and light/dark OKLCH color system definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the RVExperience inside a full-height container.
frontend/src/components/rv/ActionPlaybac: Sequential activity playback screen showing each selected action with progress and completion handling.
frontend/src/components/rv/AnimatedTrave: Crossfading Ken Burns–style animated background fallback rotating through four scene images.
frontend/src/components/rv/CampfireEndSc: Campfire celebration screen awarding an RV badge and offering a continue button.
frontend/src/components/rv/CheckpointOve: Overlay for selecting one or more checkpoint activities with validation and action toggling.
frontend/src/components/rv/checkpoints.t: Defines checkpoint data with titles and actions, exporting a list of three RV trip checkpoints and their consumptions.
frontend/src/components/rv/JourneyHaltIs: Overlay displaying an RV issue alert with checklist and a resolve action.
frontend/src/components/rv/ProgressIndic: Displays journey status, checkpoint count, and progress bar based on the current flow state.
frontend/src/components/rv/RVBadgeCelebr: Shows a celebration overlay when a badge is earned and provides a button to proceed.
Coordinates the full RV journey flow, rendering different screens based on flow state and managing timed transitions.
frontend/src/components/rv/scenes.ts: Provides scene metadata for RV journey backgrounds plus special halt and destination scenes.
frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyS: Initial welcome screen introducing the RV trip and offering a button to start the journey.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelScene.t: Renders a static scenic background with title and description for checkpoint scenes.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelTransit: Displays a loading-style transition screen when leaving a checkpoint or approaching the final destination.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelVideoSc: Plays a video for travel segments with fallback logic if playback stalls and triggers checkpoint advancement when appropriate.
End-of-journey screen summarizing trip stats and offering a restart option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider handling auth client setup, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useRVFlow.ts: Manages RV journey state transitions, user actions at checkpoints, and resource consumption tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with desert-inspired colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current Flutter web app state, including flow requirements for a 3‑stop journey, architectural notes, and known issues. Captures features, constraints, and behavior updates for travel, break stops, activities, and final campfire flow.
